chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (l : term_list), prec_in_dta d p -> S (essence_list l d p) <= essence (app c l) d

Premises:
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
essence_list = fun (l : term_list) (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) => match l with | tnil => 1 | tcons _ _ => match pl with | prec_cons _ _ _ => taille_0 pl + S (term_high_0 l) * S (DTA_taille d) | prec_empty => 1 end end : term_list -> preDTA -> prec_list -> nat
essence = fun (t : term) (d : preDTA) => S (term_high t) * S (DTA_taille d) : term -> preDTA -> nat
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
ad = BinNums.N : Set
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
preDTA = Map state : Set
borne_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), prec_in_dta d p -> taille_0 p <= DTA_taille d
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
borne_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state), state_in_dta d s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille d
rec_list_terms = fix rec_term (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match t with | app c l => match MapGet state d a with | Some lts => match MapGet prec_list lts c with | Some pre => rec_list_terms d pre l k | None => false end | None => false end end end with rec_list_terms (d : preDTA) (pre : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match pre with | prec_cons st stp pre' => match l with | tnil => false | tcons hd tl => rec_list_terms d pre' l k || rec_term d st hd k && rec_list_terms d stp tl k end | prec_empty => match l with | tnil => true | tcons _ _ => false end...
rec_term = fix rec_term (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match t with | app c l => match MapGet state d a with | Some lts => match MapGet prec_list lts c with | Some pre => rec_list_terms d pre l k | None => false end | None => false end end end with rec_list_terms (d : preDTA) (pre : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match pre with | prec_cons st stp pre' => match l with | tnil => false | tcons hd tl => rec_list_terms d pre' l k || rec_term d st hd k && rec_list_terms d stp tl k end | prec_empty => match l with | tnil => true | tcons _ _ => false end end...
high_aux_2 : forall (l : term_list) (c : ad), 1 <= term_high (app c l)
high_aux_0 : forall (a : ad) (l : term_list), S (term_high_0 l) <= term_high (app a l)
high_aux_1 : forall (a : ad) (l : term_list), S (term_high_0 l) = term_high (app a l)
state_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) => exists b : ad, MapGet state d b = Some s /\ a <> b : preDTA -> state -> ad -> Prop
state_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) => exists a : ad, MapGet state d a = Some s : preDTA -> state -> Prop
prec_contained_ind : forall P : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop, (forall p : prec_list, P p p) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> P p p1 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> forall p p0 : prec_list, prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
DTA_taille = fix DTA_taille (d : preDTA) : nat := match d with | @M0 _ => 0 | @M1 _ _ y => taille_1 y | @M2 _ x y => Nat.max (DTA_taille x) (DTA_taille y) end : preDTA -> nat
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
alist_conc_sorted : forall (A : Type) (l l' : alist A), alist_sorted_2 A l -> alist_sorted_2 A l' -> (forall n n' : nat, S n <= length l -> S n' <= length l' -> Ndigits.Nless (alist_nth_ad A n l) (alist_nth_ad A n' l') = true) -> alist_sorted_2 A (aapp A l l')
alist_semantics_nth_ad : forall (A : Type) (l : alist A) (a : ad) (y : A), alist_semantics A l a = Some y -> {n : nat | S n <= length l /\ alist_nth_ad A n l = a}
prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
prec_list_rect : forall P : prec_list -> Type, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_rec : forall P : prec_list -> Set, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p

```coq
intros d p c l H.
unfold essence, essence_list in *.
destruct l.
- simpl. lia.
- simpl.
rewrite <- borne_2.
apply le_trans with (m := taille_0 p + S (term_high_0 l) * S (DTA_taille d)).
+ apply Nat.add_le_mono_l.
apply Nat.mul_le_mono_l.
apply high_aux_0.
+ apply H.
Qed.```

original: intros d p c l H. unfold essence, essence_list in *. destruct l. - simpl. lia. - simpl. rewrite <- borne_2. apply le_trans with (m := taille_0 p + S (term_high_0 l) * S (DTA_taille d)). + apply Nat.add_le_mono_l. apply Nat.mul_le_mono_l. apply high_aux_0. + apply H.
